name: Urban Strings Columbus
address: P.O. Box 13673, Columbus, OH 43213 (Administrative address); 57 Jefferson Avenue, Columbus, OH 43215 (Performance address)
description: This youth orchestra focuses on recruiting and supporting underserved, urban, African American, and minority youth to become string musicians, performing various genres of music

name: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra
address: Music Hall, 1241 Elm St, Cincinnati, OH 45202
description: The Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra frequently celebrates Black music, heritage, and performers, including programs like "Classical Roots" which honors the legacy of African American music

name: Canton Symphony Orchestra
description: The Canton Symphony Orchestra has worked to make classical music more welcoming and has spotlighted Black composers

name: Akron Symphony Orchestra
description: The Akron Symphony Orchestra has programs that pay tribute to the American spirit and celebrate African American musical traditions, including collaborations with the Gospel Meets Symphony choir

name: Toledo Symphony Orchestra
description: The Toledo Symphony Orchestra has held concerts to honor Black History Month, featuring music from spirituals and works by African American composers

name: Dayton Philharmonic Orchestra
address: Schuster Center, Second and Main Streets, Dayton, OH (Specific administrative address not found)
description: The Dayton Philharmonic Orchestra has a community engagement series that partners with African-American church choirs to celebrate music and community

name: ProMusica Chamber Orchestra (Columbus)
description: ProMusica Chamber Orchestra has celebrated Black excellence in orchestral music, featuring works by Black composers and supporting young African American and Latinx string players

name: Cleveland Orchestra
description: The Cleveland Orchestra has presented community concerts like "Honoring Black Composers" at Karamu House, showcasing music by African American classical composers

name: Columbus Cultural Orchestra
address: Not explicitly listed, but has performed at Lincoln Theatre, Columbus, OH
description: This orchestra is dedicated to exploring and performing R&B, jazz, and hip-hop alongside Western classical repertoire, aiming to increase the number of Black musicians in professional orchestras

name: Black Swamp Community Orchestra
address: Defiance, OH (Specific administrative address not found)
description: While not exclusively an African-American-owned orchestra, they have appointed an African-American conductor, Allana D. Bogan, for their Fall 2025 season
